Literature.Title: Anti-mycobacterial activities of synthetic cationic α-helical peptides and their synergism with rifampicin.
Literature.Author: Khara JS, Wang Y, Ke XY, Liu S, Newton SM, Langford PR, Yang YY, Ee PL

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium smegmatis ATCC 14468(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Mycobacterium bovis BCG(MIC=500µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=>500µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis CSU87(MIC=125µg/ml)
